Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires the members of the state board of parole, and parole hearing officers to be composed of a proportionate share of residents
Summary: Requires the membership of the state board of parole, and parole hearing officers to be composed of a proportionate share of residents of each county to reflect the state's incarcerated individual population.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the composition of the state board of parole and parole hearing officers
